title: Specification Viewer System
description: A read-only system for viewing and displaying specifications organized by project in the specs folder. The system provides a list view of all specifications grouped by project and a detailed view for visualizing individual specifications. Similar to the existing decision and audio features, it includes both backend API endpoints and UI components for local development use.
